attributes.action: eradicate the use of non-human animals in favour of using convicted murderers, rapists and paedophiles as modern day "lab rats".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the Nation (read Government of the day) finally sees sense to reinstate the Death Penalty as a truly fair and equal punishment for those who commit the most heinous of crimes then non-human animals will no longer be required in research facilities. The convicted murderers, rapists, paedophiles, etc. can take their places. Afterall the non-human animals have commit no crimes against society to deserve such cruel and unusual punishment nor do they possess the correct corresponding physiologies to us humans that the research may or may not be in aid of. Instead of torturing innocent non-human animals before ultimately killing them once they have served their purpose to the men (and women) in white coats use the need for "lab rats" as the British equivalent to the North American "Death Row"!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
